articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow text and radio commentary as defending champions Trent Rockets host Southern Brave in the opening game of the 2023 Men's Hundred.
articles.title: The Hundred: Trent Rockets v Southern Brave - watch, listen & follow text

articles.description: Lauren James produces a sensational performance as England sweep aside China and book their place in the last 16 of the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Stunning James helps England power into last 16

articles.description: England produce their best performance of the Netball World Cup so far to beat Fiji and confirm their place in the semi-finals.
articles.title: England dominate Fiji to reach World Cup semi-finals

articles.description: Highlights of China v England, Haiti v Denmark, Portugal v USA and Vietnam v Netherlands.
articles.title: BBC Sport - Fifa Women's World Cup 2023, Highlights: China v England, Haiti v Denmark, Portugal v USA, Vietnam v Netherlands

articles.description: Watch highlights as Lauren James produces a sensational performance to help England thrash China 6-1 and reach the Women's World Cup last 16.
articles.title: England thrash China to reach World Cup last 16

articles.description: Chelsea complete the signing of teenage French midfielder Lesley Ugochukwu from Rennes on a seven-year deal for 27m euros (£23.2m).
articles.title: Chelsea sign teenager Ugochukwu on seven-year deal

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp says it is "not helpful" that the transfer window in Saudi Arabia is open for significantly longer than in Europe.
articles.title: Saudi window closing after Europe not helpful - Klopp

articles.description: Stuart Broad's finale was a fitting finish to an incredible Ashes series. I'll admit 2-2 is a fair result, writes Glenn McGrath.
articles.title: 'We'll miss Broad too, but I have a last Ashes grumble'

articles.description: England's Lauren James did "special things" in their impressive 6-1 victory over China in the Women's World Cup, says manager Sarina Wiegman.
articles.title: 'She did special things' - Wiegman praises James

articles.description: Two-time Hundred finalists Southern Brave start their campaign with a dominant 27-run win over Trent Rockets.
articles.title: Brave thrash Rockets in women's Hundred opener
